## Background

I worked with Nija Shi and Guillaume Brat in the Intelligent Systems Division on a project management tool to organize digital mission requirements, documents, and artifacts.

## What I Do

In my role as a Research Data Scientist, I fine-tuned BERT transformer models to more accurately categorize documents.
